024package org.forgerock.openidm.external.rest;
025
026import java.net.URI;
027import java.net.URISyntaxException;
028import java.text.ParseException;
029import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
030import java.util.ArrayList;
031import java.util.Date;
032import java.util.HashMap;
033import java.util.List;
034import java.util.Map;
035
036import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
037import org.apache.felix.scr.annotations.Activate;
038import org.apache.felix.scr.annotations.Component;
039import org.apache.felix.scr.annotations.ConfigurationPolicy;
040import org.apache.felix.scr.annotations.Deactivate;
041import org.apache.felix.scr.annotations.Properties;
042import org.apache.felix.scr.annotations.Property;
043import org.apache.felix.scr.annotations.Service;
044import org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue;
045import org.forgerock.json.resource.ActionRequest;
046import org.forgerock.json.resource.BadRequestException;
047import org.forgerock.json.resource.InternalServerErrorException;
048import org.forgerock.json.resource.NotSupportedException;
049import org.forgerock.json.resource.PatchRequest;
050import org.forgerock.json.resource.ReadRequest;
051import org.forgerock.json.resource.Resource;
052import org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException;
053import org.forgerock.json.resource.ResultHandler;
054import org.forgerock.json.resource.ServerContext;
055import org.forgerock.json.resource.SingletonResourceProvider;
056import org.forgerock.json.resource.UpdateRequest;
057import org.forgerock.openidm.core.ServerConstants;
058import org.forgerock.openidm.util.JsonUtil;
059import org.osgi.framework.Constants;
060import org.osgi.service.component.ComponentContext;
061import org.restlet.Client;
062import org.restlet.Context;
063import org.restlet.Request;
064import org.restlet.Response;
065import org.restlet.data.CacheDirective;
066import org.restlet.data.ChallengeRequest;
067import org.restlet.data.ChallengeResponse;
068import org.restlet.data.ChallengeScheme;
069import org.restlet.data.CharacterSet;
070import org.restlet.data.Cookie;
071import org.restlet.data.Digest;
072import org.restlet.data.Disposition;
073import org.restlet.data.Encoding;
074import org.restlet.data.Expectation;
075import org.restlet.data.Form;
076import org.restlet.data.Language;
077import org.restlet.data.MediaType;
078import org.restlet.data.Metadata;
079import org.restlet.data.Preference;
080import org.restlet.data.Protocol;
081import org.restlet.data.Range;
082import org.restlet.data.Reference;
083import org.restlet.data.Status;
084import org.restlet.data.Tag;
085import org.restlet.data.Warning;
086import org.restlet.engine.header.CookieReader;
087import org.restlet.engine.header.Header;
088import org.restlet.engine.header.HeaderConstants;
089import org.restlet.engine.util.Base64;
090import org.restlet.representation.EmptyRepresentation;
091import org.restlet.representation.Representation;
092import org.restlet.representation.StringRepresentation;
093import org.restlet.resource.ClientResource;
094import org.restlet.util.Series;
095import org.slf4j.Logger;
096import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
097
098/**
099 * External REST connectivity
100 *
101 * @author aegloff
102 */
103@Component(name = RestService.PID, immediate = true, policy = ConfigurationPolicy.IGNORE,
104        enabled = true)
105@Service
106@Properties({
107    @Property(name = Constants.SERVICE_VENDOR, value = ServerConstants.SERVER_VENDOR_NAME),
108    @Property(name = Constants.SERVICE_DESCRIPTION, value = "ForgeRock AS"),
109    @Property(name = ServerConstants.ROUTER_PREFIX, value = "/external/rest") })
110public class RestService implements SingletonResourceProvider {
111
112    public static final String PID = "org.forgerock.openidm.external.rest";
113
114    /**
115     * Setup logging for the {@link RestService}.
116     */
117    final static Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(RestService.class);
118
119    // Keys in the JSON configuration
120    // public static final String CONFIG_X = "X";
121
122    // Keys in the request parameters to override config
123    public static final String ARG_URL = "url";
124    public static final String ARG_DETECT_RESULT_FORMAT = "detectResultFormat";
125    public static final String ARG_BODY = "body";
126    public static final String ARG_CONTENT_TYPE = "contentType";
127    public static final String ARG_HEADERS = "headers";
128    public static final String ARG_AUTHENTICATE = "authenticate";
129    public static final String ARG_METHOD = "method";
130
131    @Activate
132    void activate(ComponentContext compContext) throws Exception {
133        logger.info("External REST connectivity started.");
134    }
135
136    @Deactivate
137    void deactivate(ComponentContext compContext) {
138        logger.info("External REST connectivity stopped.");
139    }
140
141    @Override
142    public void patchInstance(ServerContext context, PatchRequest request,
143            ResultHandler<Resource> handler) {
144        final ResourceException e = new NotSupportedException("Patch operations are not supported");
145        handler.handleError(e);
146    }
147
148    @Override
149    public void readInstance(ServerContext context, ReadRequest request,
150            ResultHandler<Resource> handler) {
151        final ResourceException e = new NotSupportedException("Read operations are not supported");
152        handler.handleError(e);
153    }
154
155    @Override
156    public void updateInstance(ServerContext context, UpdateRequest request,
157            ResultHandler<Resource> handler) {
158        final ResourceException e =
159                new NotSupportedException("Update operations are not supported");
160        handler.handleError(e);
161    }
162
163    @Override
164    public void actionInstance(ServerContext context, ActionRequest request,
165            ResultHandler<JsonValue> handler) {
166        try {
167            logger.debug("Action invoked on {} with {}", request.getAction(), request);
168
169            JsonValue content = request.getContent();
170
171            if (content == null
172                    || !content.isMap()
173                    || content.asMap().isEmpty()) {
174                handler.handleError(new BadRequestException("Invalid action call on "
175                        + request.getResourceName() + "/" + request.getAction()
176                        + " : missing post body to define what to invoke."));
177                return;
178            }
179
180            String url = content.get(ARG_URL).required().asString();
181            String method = content.get(ARG_METHOD).required().asString();
182            JsonValue auth = content.get(ARG_AUTHENTICATE);
183            Map<String, Object> headers = content.get(ARG_HEADERS).asMap();
184            String contentType = content.get(ARG_CONTENT_TYPE).asString();
185            String body = content.get(ARG_BODY).asString();
186            // Whether the data type DATE_FORMAT to return to the caller should be inferred, or is explicitly defined
187            boolean detectResultFormat = content.get(ARG_DETECT_RESULT_FORMAT).defaultTo(true).asBoolean();
188
189            MediaType mediaType;
190            if (contentType != null) {
191                mediaType = new MediaType(contentType);
192            } else {
193                // Default
194                mediaType = MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON;
195            }
196
197            ClientResource cr = null;
198
199            try {
200                cr = new ClientResource(url);
201                Map<String, Object> attrs = cr.getRequestAttributes();
202
203                setAttributes(cr.getRequest(), attrs, headers);
204
205                if (!auth.isNull()) {
206                    String type = auth.get("type").defaultTo("basic").asString();
207                    if ("basic".equalsIgnoreCase(type)) {
208                        String identifier = auth.get("user").required().asString();
209                        String secret = auth.get("password").required().asString();
210                        logger.debug("Using basic authentication for {} secret supplied: {}",
211                                identifier, !StringUtils.isBlank(secret));
212                        ChallengeResponse challengeResponse =
213                                new ChallengeResponse(ChallengeScheme.HTTP_BASIC, identifier, secret);
214                        cr.setChallengeResponse(challengeResponse);
215                    } else {
216                        handler.handleError(new BadRequestException("Invalid auth type \"" + type + "\" on "
217                                + request.getResourceName() + "/" + request.getAction()));
218                        return;
219                    }
220                }
221
222                StringRepresentation rep = new StringRepresentation(body);
223                rep.setMediaType(mediaType);
224
225                Representation representation = null;
226                try {
227                    if ("get".equalsIgnoreCase(method)) {
228                        representation = cr.get();
229                    } else if ("post".equalsIgnoreCase(method)) {
230                        representation = cr.post(rep);
231                    } else if ("put".equalsIgnoreCase(method)) {
232                        representation = cr.put(rep);
233                    } else if ("delete".equalsIgnoreCase(method)) {
234                        representation = cr.delete();
235                    } else if ("head".equalsIgnoreCase(method)) {
236                        representation = cr.head();
237                    } else if ("options".equalsIgnoreCase(method)) {
238                        // TODO: media type arg?
239                        representation = cr.options();
240                    } else {
241                        handler.handleError(new BadRequestException("Unknown method " + method));
242                        return;
243                    }
244                } catch (org.restlet.resource.ResourceException e) {
245                    int code = e.getStatus().getCode();
246                    String text = null;
247                    Representation responseEntity = cr.getResponseEntity();
248                    if (responseEntity != null
249                            && !(responseEntity instanceof EmptyRepresentation)) {
250                        text = responseEntity.getText();
251                    }
252
253                    final ResourceException exception =
254                            ResourceException.getException(code, "Error while processing " + method
255                                    + " request: " + e.getMessage(), e);
256
257                    if (text != null) {
258                        JsonValue detail = new JsonValue(new HashMap<String, Object>());
259                        detail.put("content", text);
260                        exception.setDetail(detail);
261                    }
262                    handler.handleError(exception);
263                    return;
264                }
265
266                String text = representation.getText();
267                logger.debug("Response: {} Response Attributes: ", text, cr.getResponseAttributes());
268
269                if (detectResultFormat && representation.getMediaType().isCompatible(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)) {
270                    try {
271                        if (text != null && text.trim().length() > 0) {
272                            // TODO Null check
273                            handler.handleResult(JsonUtil.parseStringified(text));
274                        }
275                    } catch (Exception ex) {
276                        handler.handleError(new InternalServerErrorException(
277                                "Failure in parsing the response as JSON: " + text
278                                        + " Reported failure: " + ex.getMessage(), ex));
279                    }
280                } else {
281                    try {
282                        Map<String, Object> resultHeaders = new HashMap<String, Object>();
283                        Series<Header> respHeaders =
284                                (Series<Header>) cr.getResponseAttributes().get(
285                                        HeaderConstants.ATTRIBUTE_HEADERS);
286                        if (respHeaders != null) {
287                            for (Header param : respHeaders) {
288                                String name = param.getName();
289                                String value = param.getValue();
290                                resultHeaders.put(name, value);
291                                logger.debug("Adding Response Attribute: {} : {}", name, value);
292                            }
293                        }
294                        JsonValue result = new JsonValue(new HashMap<String, Object>());
295                        result.put("headers", resultHeaders);
296                        result.put("body", text);
297                        handler.handleResult(result);
298                    } catch (Exception ex) {
299                        handler.handleError(new InternalServerErrorException("Failure in parsing the response: "
300                                + text + " Reported failure: " + ex.getMessage(), ex));
301                    }
302                }
303
304            } catch (java.io.IOException ex) {
305                handler.handleError(new InternalServerErrorException("Failed to invoke " + content, ex));
306            } finally {
307                if (null != cr) {
308                    cr.release();
309                }
310            }
311        } catch (Exception e) {
312            handler.handleError(new InternalServerErrorException(e));
313        }
314    }
315
316    private static final SimpleDateFormat DATE_FORMAT = new SimpleDateFormat("EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss zzz");
317
318    private void setAttributes(Request request, Map<String, Object> attributes, Map<String, Object> headers) {
319
320        if (headers != null) {
321            Series<Header> extraHeaders = (Series<Header>) attributes.get("org.restlet.http.headers");
322            if (extraHeaders == null) {
323                extraHeaders = new Series<Header>(Header.class);
324                attributes.put("org.restlet.http.headers", extraHeaders);
325            }
326            for (Map.Entry<String, Object> entry : headers.entrySet()) {
327                String httpHeader = entry.getKey();
328                String headerValue = String.valueOf(entry.getValue());
329                logger.info("Adding header {}: {}", entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
330                if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_ACCEPT)) {
331                    List<Preference<MediaType>> mediaTypes =
332                            request.getClientInfo().getAcceptedMediaTypes();
333                    String[] types = headerValue.split(",");
334                    for (String type : types) {
335                        String[] parts = type.split(";");
336                        String name = parts[0];
337                        MediaType mediaType = MediaType.valueOf(name);
338                        Preference pref = new Preference(mediaType);
339                        addPreferences(pref, parts);
340                        mediaTypes.add(pref);
341                    }
342                    // attributes.put("request.clientInfo.acceptedMediaTypes",
343                    // new Preference(new MediaType(entry.getValue())));
344                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_ACCEPT_CHARSET)) {
345                    List<Preference<CharacterSet>> characterSets =
346                            request.getClientInfo().getAcceptedCharacterSets();
347                    String[] sets = headerValue.split(",");
348                    for (String set : sets) {
349                        String[] parts = set.split(";");
350                        String name = parts[0];
351                        CharacterSet characterSet = CharacterSet.valueOf(name);
352                        Preference pref = new Preference(characterSet);
353                        addPreferences(pref, parts);
354                        characterSets.add(pref);
355                    }
356                    // attributes.put("request.clientInfo.acceptedCharacterSets",
357                    // new Preference(new CharacterSet(headerValue)));
358                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_ACCEPT_ENCODING)) {
359                    List<Preference<Encoding>> encodingsList =
360                            request.getClientInfo().getAcceptedEncodings();
361                    String[] encodings = headerValue.split(",");
362                    for (String enc : encodings) {
363                        String[] parts = enc.split(";");
364                        String name = parts[0];
365                        Encoding encoding = Encoding.valueOf(name);
366                        Preference pref = new Preference(encoding);
367                        addPreferences(pref, parts);
368                        encodingsList.add(pref);
369                    }
370                    // attributes.put("request.clientInfo.acceptedEncodings",
371                    // new Preference(new Encoding(headerValue)));
372                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE)) {
373                    List<Preference<Language>> languagesList =
374                            request.getClientInfo().getAcceptedLanguages();
375                    String[] languages = headerValue.split(",");
376                    for (String lang : languages) {
377                        String[] parts = lang.split(";");
378                        String name = parts[0];
379                        Language language = Language.valueOf(name);
380                        Preference pref = new Preference(language);
381                        addPreferences(pref, parts);
382                        languagesList.add(pref);
383                    }
384                    // attributes.put("request.clientInfo.acceptedLanguages",
385                    // new Preference(new Language(headerValue)));
386                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_ACCEPT_RANGES)) {
387                    attributes.put("response.serverInfo.acceptRanges", Boolean.parseBoolean(headerValue));
388                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_AGE)) {
389                    attributes.put("response.age", Integer.parseInt(headerValue));
390                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_AUTHORIZATION)) {
391                    attributes.put("request.challengeResponse", new ChallengeResponse(
392                            ChallengeScheme.valueOf(headerValue)));
393                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_CACHE_CONTROL)) {
394                    List<CacheDirective> cacheDirectives = new ArrayList<CacheDirective>();
395                    String[] cacheControls = headerValue.split(",");
396                    for (String str : cacheControls) {
397                        String name = null, value = null;
398                        int i = str.indexOf("=");
399                        if (i > -1) {
400                            name = str.substring(0, i).trim();
401                            value = str.substring(i + 1).trim();
402                        } else {
403                            name = str.trim();
404                        }
405                        if (name.equals(HeaderConstants.CACHE_MAX_AGE)) {
406                            cacheDirectives.add(CacheDirective.maxAge(Integer.parseInt(value)));
407                        } else if (name.equals(HeaderConstants.CACHE_MAX_STALE)) {
408                            if (value != null) {
409                                cacheDirectives.add(CacheDirective
410                                        .maxStale(Integer.parseInt(value)));
411                            } else {
412                                cacheDirectives.add(CacheDirective.maxStale());
413                            }
414                        } else if (name.equals(HeaderConstants.CACHE_MIN_FRESH)) {
415                            cacheDirectives.add(CacheDirective.minFresh(Integer.parseInt(value)));
416                        } else if (name.equals(HeaderConstants.CACHE_MUST_REVALIDATE)) {
417                            cacheDirectives.add(CacheDirective.mustRevalidate());
418                        } else if (name.equals(HeaderConstants.CACHE_NO_CACHE)) {
419                            if (value != null) {
420                                cacheDirectives.add(CacheDirective.noCache(value));
421                            } else {
422                                cacheDirectives.add(CacheDirective.noCache());
423                            }
424                        } else if (name.equals(HeaderConstants.CACHE_NO_STORE)) {
425                            cacheDirectives.add(CacheDirective.noStore());
426                        } else if (name.equals(HeaderConstants.CACHE_NO_TRANSFORM)) {
427                            cacheDirectives.add(CacheDirective.noTransform());
428                        } else if (name.equals(HeaderConstants.CACHE_ONLY_IF_CACHED)) {
429                            cacheDirectives.add(CacheDirective.onlyIfCached());
430                        } else if (name.equals(HeaderConstants.CACHE_PRIVATE)) {
431                            if (value != null) {
432                                cacheDirectives.add(CacheDirective.privateInfo(value));
433                            } else {
434                                cacheDirectives.add(CacheDirective.privateInfo());
435                            }
436                        } else if (name.equals(HeaderConstants.CACHE_PROXY_MUST_REVALIDATE)) {
437                            cacheDirectives.add(CacheDirective.proxyMustRevalidate());
438                        } else if (name.equals(HeaderConstants.CACHE_PUBLIC)) {
439                            cacheDirectives.add(CacheDirective.publicInfo());
440                        } else if (name.equals(HeaderConstants.CACHE_SHARED_MAX_AGE)) {
441                            cacheDirectives.add(CacheDirective
442                                    .sharedMaxAge(Integer.parseInt(value)));
443                        } else {
444                            logger.info("Unknown HTTP header Cache-Control entry: {}", str);
445                        }
446                    }
447                    attributes.put("message.cacheDirectives", cacheDirectives);
448                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_CONNECTION)) {
449                    // [HTTP Connectors]
450                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_CONTENT_DISPOSITION)) {
451                    attributes.put("message.entity.disposition", new Disposition(headerValue));
452                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_CONTENT_ENCODING)) {
453                    List<Encoding> contentEncodings = new ArrayList<Encoding>();
454                    String[] encodings = headerValue.split(",");
455                    for (String encoding : encodings) {
456                        contentEncodings.add(Encoding.valueOf(encoding.trim()));
457                    }
458                    attributes.put("message.entity.encodings", contentEncodings);
459                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_CONTENT_LANGUAGE)) {
460                    List<Language> contentLanguages = new ArrayList<Language>();
461                    String[] languages = headerValue.split(",");
462                    for (String language : languages) {
463                        contentLanguages.add(Language.valueOf(language.trim()));
464                    }
465                    attributes.put("message.entity.languages", contentLanguages);
466                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_CONTENT_LENGTH)) {
467                    attributes.put("message.entity.size", Long.parseLong(headerValue));
468                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_CONTENT_LOCATION)) {
469                    try {
470                        Reference ref = new Reference(new URI(headerValue));
471                        attributes.put("message.entity.locationRef", ref);
472                    } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
473                        logger.info("Problem parsing HTTP Content-Location header", e);
474                    }
475                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_CONTENT_MD5)) {
476                    attributes.put("message.entity.digest", new Digest(Base64.decode(headerValue)));
477                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_CONTENT_RANGE)) {
478                    String rangeString = headerValue.split(" ")[1];
479                    rangeString = rangeString.substring(rangeString.indexOf("/"));
480                    Range range;
481                    if (rangeString.equals("*")) {
482                        range = new Range();
483                    } else {
484                        long index =
485                                Long.parseLong(rangeString.substring(0, rangeString.indexOf("-")));
486                        long size =
487                                Long.parseLong(rangeString.substring(rangeString.indexOf("-") + 1))
488                                        - index + 1;
489                        range = new Range(size, index);
490                    }
491                    attributes.put("message.entity.range", range);
492                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_CONTENT_TYPE)) {
493                    attributes.put("message.entity.mediaType", new MediaType(headerValue));
494                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_COOKIE)) {
495                    CookieReader cr = new CookieReader(headerValue);
496                    List<Cookie> cookies = cr.readValues();
497                    Series<Cookie> restletCookies = request.getCookies();
498                    for (Cookie cookie : cookies) {
499                        restletCookies.add(cookie);
500                    }
501                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_DATE)) {
502                    try {
503                        Date d = DATE_FORMAT.parse(headerValue);
504                        attributes.put("message.date", d);
505                    } catch (ParseException e) {
506                        logger.error("Error parsing HTTP Date header", e);
507                    }
508                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_ETAG)) {
509                    attributes.put("message.entity.tag", Tag.parse(headerValue));
510                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_EXPECT)) {
511                    if (entry.getValue().equals("100-continue")) {
512                        request.getClientInfo().getExpectations().add(
513                                Expectation.continueResponse());
514                    }
515                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_EXPIRES)) {
516                    try {
517                        Date d = DATE_FORMAT.parse(headerValue);
518                        attributes.put("message.entity.expirationDate", d);
519                    } catch (ParseException e) {
520                        logger.error("Error parsing HTTP Expires header", e);
521                    }
522                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_FROM)) {
523                    attributes.put("request.clientInfo.from", entry.getValue());
524                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_HOST)) {
525                    try {
526                        Reference ref = new Reference(new URI(headerValue));
527                        attributes.put("request.hostRef", ref);
528                    } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
529                        logger.error("Error parsing HTTP Host header", e);
530                    }
531                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_IF_MATCH)) {
532                    String[] tags = headerValue.split(",");
533                    List<Tag> list = request.getConditions().getMatch();
534                    for (String tag : tags) {
535                        list.add(Tag.parse(tag));
536                    }
537                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_IF_MODIFIED_SINCE)) {
538                    try {
539                        request.getConditions().setModifiedSince(DATE_FORMAT.parse(headerValue));
540                    } catch (ParseException e) {
541                        logger.error("Error parsing HTTP Modified-Since header", e);
542                    }
543                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_IF_NONE_MATCH)) {
544                    String[] tags = headerValue.split(",");
545                    List<Tag> list = request.getConditions().getNoneMatch();
546                    for (String tag : tags) {
547                        list.add(Tag.parse(tag));
548                    }
549                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_IF_RANGE)) {
550                    Date rangeDate = null;
551                    Tag rangeTag = null;
552                    try {
553                        rangeDate = DATE_FORMAT.parse(headerValue);
554                        request.getConditions().setRangeDate(rangeDate);
555                    } catch (ParseException e) {
556                        rangeTag = Tag.parse(headerValue);
557                        request.getConditions().setRangeTag(rangeTag);
558                    }
559                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_IF_UNMODIFIED_SINCE)) {
560                    try {
561                        request.getConditions().setUnmodifiedSince(DATE_FORMAT.parse(headerValue));
562                    } catch (ParseException e) {
563                        logger.error("Error parsing HTTP If-Unmodified-Since header", e);
564                    }
565                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_LAST_MODIFIED)) {
566                    try {
567                        attributes.put("message.entity.modificationDate", DATE_FORMAT.parse(headerValue));
568                    } catch (ParseException e) {
569                        logger.error("Error parsing HTTP Last-Modified header", e);
570                    }
571                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_MAX_FORWARDS)) {
572                    request.setMaxForwards(Integer.parseInt(headerValue));
573                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_PROXY_AUTHORIZATION)) {
574                    request.setProxyChallengeResponse(new ChallengeResponse(ChallengeScheme.valueOf(headerValue)));
575                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_RANGE)) {
576                    String rangeSection = headerValue.split("=")[1];
577                    String[] ranges = rangeSection.split(",");
578                    List<Range> rangeList = new ArrayList<Range>();
579                    for (String range : ranges) {
580                        Range r;
581                        if (range.startsWith("-")) {
582                            r = new Range(-1, Integer.parseInt(range.substring(1)));
583                        } else if (range.indexOf("-") == -1) {
584                            r = new Range(Integer.parseInt(range));
585                        } else if (range.endsWith("-")) {
586                            r = new Range(-1, Integer.parseInt(range.substring(0, range.length() - 1)));
587                        } else {
588                            long index = Long.parseLong(range.substring(0, range.indexOf("-")));
589                            long size = Long.parseLong(range.substring(range.indexOf("-") + 1)) - index + 1;
590                            r = new Range(size, index);
591                        }
592                        rangeList.add(r);
593                    }
594                    request.setRanges(rangeList);
595                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_REFERRER)) {
596                    try {
597                        Reference ref = new Reference(new URI(headerValue));
598                        attributes.put("request.refererRef", ref);
599                    } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
600                        logger.error("Error parsing HTTP Referrer header", e);
601                    }
602                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_TRANSFER_ENCODING)) {
603                    // [HTTP Connectors]
604                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_USER_AGENT)) {
605                    attributes.put("request.clientInfo.agent", headerValue);
606                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_VARY)) {
607                    attributes.put("response.dimensions", headerValue);
608                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_VIA)) {
609                    // return "message.recipientsInfo";
610                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_WARNING)) {
611                    try {
612                        List<Warning> warnings = (List<Warning>) attributes.get("message.warnings");
613                        if (warnings == null) {
614                            warnings = new ArrayList<Warning>();
615                            attributes.put("message.warnings", warnings);
616                        }
617                        Warning warning = new Warning();
618                        String[] strs = headerValue.split(" ");
619                        warning.setStatus(Status.valueOf(Integer.parseInt(strs[0])));
620                        warning.setAgent(strs[1]);
621                        warning.setText(strs[2]);
622                        if (strs.length > 3) {
623                            Date d = DATE_FORMAT.parse(strs[3]);
624                            warning.setDate(d);
625                        }
626                        warnings.add(warning);
627                    } catch (Exception e) {
628                        logger.error("Error parsing HTTP Warning header", e);
629                    }
630                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_WWW_AUTHENTICATE)) {
631                    attributes.put("response.challengeRequests", new ChallengeRequest(
632                            ChallengeScheme.valueOf(headerValue)));
633                } else if (httpHeader.equals(HeaderConstants.HEADER_X_FORWARDED_FOR)) {
634                    List<String> list = (List<String>) attributes.get("request.clientInfo.addresses");
635                    if (list == null) {
636                        list = new ArrayList<String>();
637                        attributes.put("request.clientInfo.addresses", list);
638                    }
639                    list.add(headerValue);
640                } else {
641                    // Custom headers
642                    extraHeaders.set(httpHeader, headerValue);
643                }
644            }
645        }
646    }
647
648    private <T extends Metadata> void addPreferences(Preference<T> pref, String[] parts) {
649        if (parts.length > 1) {
650            for (int i = 1; i < parts.length; i++) {
651                String[] strs = parts[i].split("=");
652                String n = strs[0].trim();
653                String v = strs[1].trim();
654                if (n.endsWith("q")) {
655                    pref.setQuality(Float.parseFloat(v));
656                } else {
657                    pref.getParameters().add(n, v);
658                }
659            }
660        }
661    }
662
663    public static ClientResource createClientResource(JsonValue params) {
664        // TODO use the
665        // https://wikis.forgerock.org/confluence/display/json/http-request
666        String url = params.get(ARG_URL).required().asString();
667        Context context = new Context();
668
669        context.getParameters().set("maxTotalConnections", "16");
670        context.getParameters().set("maxConnectionsPerHost", "8");
671
672        ClientResource cr = new ClientResource(context, url);
673        JsonValue _authenticate = params.get(ARG_AUTHENTICATE);
674
675        if (!_authenticate.isNull()) {
676            ChallengeScheme authType =
677                    ChallengeScheme.valueOf(_authenticate.get("type").asString());
678            if (authType == null) {
679                authType = ChallengeScheme.HTTP_BASIC;
680            }
681            if (ChallengeScheme.HTTP_BASIC.equals(authType)) {
682                String identifier = _authenticate.get("user").required().asString();
683                String secret = _authenticate.get("password").asString();
684                logger.debug("Using basic authentication for {} secret supplied: {}", identifier,
685                        (secret != null));
686                ChallengeResponse challengeResponse =
687                        new ChallengeResponse(authType, identifier, secret);
688                cr.setChallengeResponse(challengeResponse);
689                cr.getRequest().setChallengeResponse(challengeResponse);
690            }
691            if (ChallengeScheme.HTTP_COOKIE.equals(authType)) {
692
693                String authenticationTokenPath = "openidm/j_security_check";
694
695                // Prepare the request
696                Request request =
697                        new Request(org.restlet.data.Method.POST, authenticationTokenPath
698                                + authenticationTokenPath);
699
700                Form loginForm = new Form();
701                loginForm.add("j_username", "admin");
702                loginForm.add("j_password", "admin");
703                Representation repEnt = loginForm.getWebRepresentation();
704
705                request.setEntity(repEnt);
706
707                Client client = new Client(Protocol.HTTP);
708
709                request.setEntity(repEnt);
710                Response res = client.handle(request);
711
712                String identifier = _authenticate.get("user").required().asString();
713                String secret = _authenticate.get("password").asString();
714                logger.debug("Using cookie authentication for {} secret supplied: {}", identifier,
715                        (secret != null));
716                ChallengeResponse challengeResponse =
717                        new ChallengeResponse(authType, identifier, secret);
718                cr.setChallengeResponse(challengeResponse);
719                cr.getRequest().setChallengeResponse(challengeResponse);
720            }
721        }
722
723        return cr;
724    }
725}
